msgSnippet: Hi, could you please explain what happens after you annotate the code like this: @AutoTest @InputParams @AutoAssert public int add(int a,int b) Are tests

Hi,

could you please explain what happens after you annotate the code like this:

@AutoTest
@InputParams
@AutoAssert
public int add(int a,int b)
Are tests automatically generated? What test cases are created? What
assertions?

-- 
Regards / Pozdrawiam
Tomek Kaczanowski
http://practicalunittesting.com
